post:
BodHOST’s Linux VPS servers offer the ultimate cost advantage along with Cloud environment. The offering has its base on eNlight cloud virtualization platform, powered by vLite with static resource allocation. The major advantage of this system is a hardware virtualization platform; the supporting processors are highly responsive in the virtual server environment.

Check the following configuration:

Linux VPS Standard
• HDD: 25 GB
• Bandwidth: 600 GB
• RAM: 1.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Starts at: $29.99/month

Linux VPS Enterprise
• HDD: 45 GB
• Bandwidth: 1 TB
• RAM: 2 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Starts at: $49.99/month

Linux VPS Corporate
• HDD: 65 GB
• Bandwidth: 2 TB
• RAM: 2.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Starts at: $69.99/month

Control Panel Options
• Cpanel/WHM: $8.00/month
• Plesk 12 Web Admin Edition: $3.00/month
• Plesk 12 Web App Edition: $5.00/month
• Plesk 12 Wen Pro Edition: $7.00/month
• Plesk 12 Web Host Edition: $14.00/month

Also get SSL, SpamExperts Spam Filter and R1Soft backup plans at competitive prices!
